Background

I am a 25-year-old entrepreneur that has his MBA with a concentration in Entrepreneurship. I did my undergraduate at the University of Central Florida. I graduated with my B.S.B.A. in Finance and Management with a focus in entrepreneurship, and a minor in International Business. I am a very Loud and Proud UCF Knight. I played/coached professional tennis for the last 3 years. I am the CEO/ founding father of Cheval Vintage.
